description: This file defines a React component called AppNavbar, which implements a top navigation bar with a global book search feature, including dropdown suggestions with images and keyboard navigation.

methods.name: AppNavbar
methods.description: Main React component rendering the navigation bar with search feature.

methods.name: goToCatalogWithQuery
methods.description: Navigates to the catalog page with the search query as URL parameter.

methods.name: goToBookDetails
methods.description: Navigates to the detailed page for a specific book by ID.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles search form submission, including exact match redirection or catalog search.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keyboard navigation and actions within the search input.
